import { useState } from "react" export const InputForm = (calculate) => { const [currentSavings, setCurrentSavings] = useState('') const [yearlyContribution, setYearlyContribution] = useState('') const [expectedReturns, setExpectedReturns] = useState('') const handleChange = (event) => { const id = event.target.id const value = event.target.value setUserInput(values => ({...values, [id]: value})) } // const submitHandler = () => { // calculate() // } return (

setCurrentSavings(e.target.value)}/>

setYearlyContribution(e.target.value)}/>

setExpectedReturns(e.target.value)}/>

) }
